name: Insect, Swarm of Insects
movement: 20 ft. on ground, climbs at same speed
description: A swarm of tiny insects that can crawl all over to disrupt foes. It moves fluidly through small openings and can cover creatures in buzzing bugs.
memorable: Can disrupt spellcasting by covering foes in insects.
goals: To surround, overwhelm, and disrupt spellcasters in combat.
relations: Often found in numbers, may accompany other creatures that benefit from its disruptive abilities.
environment: Commonly found in rural or wild environments, especially where there are natural hiding spots.
strengths: Resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage, and immune to many conditions.
weaknesses: Low offensive power and relies on numbers for effectiveness.
attacks: Bites that deal piercing damage, fluctuating based on hit points.
most_powerful_ability: Crawling Swarm, which disrupts enemy spellcasting.
senses: Keen senses with a perception score of 8, granting very poor awareness.
skills: High stealth modifier of +11, making it very good at remaining unseen until attacking.
additional_information: Can occupy the same space as other creatures and move through tiny openings.
Cannot regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
Effective in larger numbers to create challenges for players.
Can be a nuisance in combat by hindering spellcasters.
Often used to create tactical advantages in encounters.
test_queries: swarm of tiny insects that disrupt spells
insect swarm that moves through small openings
